[~ajisakaa],

It is similar to YARN-4294 and YARN-4300.

The javadoc failure on trunk makes sense. The javadoc generation currently fails on trunk so the expectation is failing pre-patch and pass after patch.
The new javadoc warnings do not make sense. I guess they are because the previous failures.
The unit test failures are unrelated.

Locally everything also seems OK. Could you please check my patch?
Thanks [~boky01] for reporting this and providing the patch. +1, committing this shortly.
Committed this to trunk, branch-2, and branch-2.8. Thank you, Andras!
